description:
Kurumi was a hamster in her past life. One day she escaped from her cage and went on an adventure, but got lost and was unable to get home. She died of starvation and is now afraid of hunger. Her name means walnut. Her color image is yellow.
In the anime, she has maintained her hamster-instincts, ie: to eat a lot so that she wouldn`t starve to death again. Her hairstyle, bao, and mouth shape represent a hamster`s ears and mouth. She often says "nano" at the end of her sentences. Kurumi is one of the first 3 angels that appeared in the series. Kurumi is in the Intermediate rank.
name: Hamster no Kurumi
